module.name: HTML
module.param:
Platform Advisor for Remedy

Sourcetypes

remedy_user - The Remedy user log

remedy_api - The Remedy API log

remedy_filter - The Remedy filter log

remedy_escalation - The escalation log

remedy_approval - The approval log

remedy_armonitor - The AR monitor log

remedy_arplugin - The AR plugin log

remedy_arerror - The AR error log

remedy_cmdb - The CMDB log

remedy_fulltextsrh - The full text SRH log

remedy_midtier - The Remedy mid-tier log

remedy_servergroup - The server group log

remedy_sql - The Remedy SQL log

remedy_thread - The Remedy thread log

apache_tomcat - This should actually be log4j, not apache_tomcat, unless Remedy's Tomcat logs things differently than the stock version from Apache.
